title: The Brain of the Apocalypse
description: Amidst a world filled with dangerous criminals, terrorists and government conspiracies, stands the Agency – an ultra secret organization who’s mission is to protect the innocent and safeguard the World. This legendary organization brings together the greatest geniuses, the most talented agents and cutting edge technologies. However, something unusual is about to happen : a brilliant new recruit with unusual methods is about to join the Agency. His name : Jon Le Bon. He will forever change the balance of power between good and evil.
author: Alex A.
